title: If the Owner opts to develop the cited AH & OA, the Owner shall be entitled for FSI 1 of the gross p
clause_text: If the Owner opts to develop the cited AH & OA, the Owner shall be entitled for FSI 1 of the gross plot (AH + POS+ OA + area covered under roads to be handed over to MCGM + land forming Owner’s share of that specific scheme) on the Owner’s share of land along with cost of construction in the form of BUA as per Clause (E) (a)
